DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , single ascend dose study assess safety , tolerability , PK ACHN-975 normal healthy volunteer . This study take place US one clinical site .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics ACHN-975 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Key Body weight 40 100 kilogram ( ~88 pound ~220 pound ) Use contraception Stable health Negative test alcohol , tobacco , drug abuse Key History clinically significant disease Pregnancy
